name: Kushagra Gupta
headline: Full Stack Software Engineer & UI/UX Enthusiast
summary:
I am a self-motivated individual, enthusiastic and eager to learn new tech! I am interested in Fullstack application development, building enterprise applications, applying OOP techniques and best practices followed in the software industry. I also take interest in UI/UX research.
I have an inclination towards working for startups as I believe It would provide me with an opportunity to work on large scale projects alongside a small team of enthusiastic and innovative engineers, and my contribution would be much more significant.
Apart from coursework, I take out time to work on my project ideas, learn new languages, frameworks, and best practices, that I can integrate into the coding web in my head.

school.name: The University of Texas at Dallas
school.course: Master of Science in Computer Science
